Description: Green glazed composition shabti of Imy-r... P-di-Wsir Born of T3-šrt-t3-iḥt with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a plaited beard and crossed arms in relief holding an adze, a hoe and the string of the seed-basket that hangs over the shoulder; the waist is inscribed with a row of incised Hieroglyphs and the front of the leg section is inscribed with a similar column.
